__TOC__

This cycle I concentrated my work mainly in my GSoC 2010 Project, and off course getting the latest packages in Ubuntu for the Cluster Stack.

=== Google Summer of Code 2010 - TestDrive PyGTK Front-end ===

I've participated in the Google Summer of Code 2010 for Ubuntu, working on the TestDrive PyGTK Front-end project. Now, I became Upstream Maintainer of Both TestDrive and TestDrive PyGTK Front-end.

More information about the work done for the GSoC, and off course beyond can be found at:

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/desktop-maverick-testdrive-frontend-gsoc

=== Cluster Stack in Maverick ===

As always, work on the Cluster has been done, even though this cycle has been slow for us because right now we have a stable cluster stack, but we will make further improvements to it.

https://blueprints.launchpad.net/ubuntu/+spec/server-maverick-clusterstack
